title: 107_hr5608
content: Comprehensive Wildlife Disease Testing Acceleration Act of 2002 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, with respect to chronic wasting disease , to: (1) issue guidelines for animal tissue collecting and laboratory testing, (2) establish a laboratory certification and inspection program. And (3) accelerate testing research. Establishes the Interagency Task Force on Epizootic Hemorrhagic Disease to coordinate epizootic hemorrhagic disease prevention activities.
